title: Digital Storytelling-Based LMOOCs Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital learning experience
context.additional_context: An intensive course aimed at improving job-relevant language proficiency for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can generate context-specific language expressions with over 80% accuracy using Digital Storytelling (DST).
Peer feedback based on a connectivist approach facilitates at least three learner interactions.
Achieve a participation rate and task completion rate of over 75% in weekly assessment missions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
